title: Winecell
info: Created Backend API with Rails using SQLite as database
Utilized Redux library for all API calls and state management
Used Thunk middleware to make asynchronous calls

title: Lookit
info: Fetching data from the Unsplash API

title: Parksbook
description: Helps users create and share park visits
info: Built RESTful API using Ruby on Rails and the MVC pattern
Developed interactive AJAX functionality with JavaScript and jQuery
Used Omniauth for OAuth authentication with Facebook
Integrated Bootstrap to design the UI

title: Adventure
info: Used Sinatra to build APIs and MVC pattern
Authenticated users using Ruby gem BCrypt
Incorporated Bootstrap to style the front end

title: Wanderer
description: CLI app showing long-distance hiking trails around the world
info: Used Nokogiri to scrape data from Fodor's website
Added CLI executable to run program
Utilized the Colorize gem to style the CLI
